title: Ticket #4953: Detection for not shutting down one or more daemons
description: In the process of working on shared port tests on windows I noticed issues with all the daemons in a personal condor shutting down. We never cared if we leaked daemons or entire test personal condor's before. Now it will cause a test to fail.
check_ins:
2015-Apr-02 08:16   Check-in [44498]: Turning checking for leaked personal condors back on #4953 Two failing tests needed shorter MaxVacateTime, not default 10 minutes. (By Bill Taylor )
2015-Mar-31 13:54   Check-in [44471]: Mostly we are delaying seeing if we are leaking personal #4953 condors. Some parsing changes to skip over the output of condor_who -daemon. These two tests have caused us to write up a bug we do not fully understand yet (By Bill Taylor )
2015-Mar-24 20:36   Check-in [43711]: Cleaned up results from checking that all daemons turn off. #4953 fixed two tests where they did not turn off due to job states. (By Bill Taylor )
2015-Mar-23 10:11   Check-in [43660]: We now ensure a test does not leak either an entire personal #4953 condor nor even a single daemon. (By Bill Taylor )
